name: 2D Space Shooter (spacercraft)
description: The finish game is a 2D fighter pilot game, where you have to fly around and destroy the enemies ships. In this game I have made you have 3 lives. I have made so that every time a enemy pilot shoots or runs into you in the game you lose a life. The game continues to get hard until it is eventually it is impossible. Once you have lose all your lives the game, the game ends and the screen goes black saying "Game Over, Man". That is the end of the program, all you have to is reload the game back up and you can play it as many times as you like.
